text:
e="preserve">Austin Deasy (26 August 1936 – 10 June 2017) was an Irish Fine Gael politician. He served as Minister for Agriculture from 1982 to 1987. He was a TD for the Waterford constituency from 1977 until his retirement in 2002.
Deasy died at University Hospital Waterford in Waterford, Ireland on 10 June 2017 at the age of 80.
